summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 HARLEY DAVIDSON SOFTAIL MOTORCYCLE. WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO SHAKE. IN ADDITION, THE VEHICLE VIOLENTLY SHAKES DURING DECELERATION. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER ON SEVEN DIFFERENT TIMES AND THEY ADVISED THAT THE VEHICLE FUNCTIONED PROPERLY WITHIN THE MANUFACTURER'S SPECIFICATIONS. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 10.
